00001 <h2>Instructions</h2>
00002 <p>
00003         Drop Regina Pacis Widget into ~/Library/Widgets
00004         (that's the Library folder located in your home folder)
00005         or into /Library/Widgets if you want to install it for all the users of
00006         your computer.
00007         Activate Dashboard, drag the widget to your screen and enjoy!
00008 </p>
00009 
00010 <h3>Messages</h3>
00011 <p>
00012         Messages are automatically displayed in your favorite language (available are English,
00013         German, French, Italian, Spanish, Croatian or Polish) every time you activate Dashboard.
00014 </p>
00015 
00016 <h3>Updates</h3>
00017 <p class="centered">
00018         <img src="/assets/images/software/widgets/reginapacis/update-icon.png" alt="Update available notice" />
00019 </p>
00020 <p>
00021         When you see the exclamation mark icon and the &ldquo;Update available&rdquo; notice, click it to
00022         be brought to the page that contains the update and download it.
00023 </p>
00024 <p>
00025         Since the webmasters of
00026         <a href="http://www.medjugorje.hr" class="external">http://www.medjugorje.hr</a>
00027         use to paste the messages full of garbageãfrom MS Word, the parser needs to
00028         be adjusted to keep working with always new data formats.
00029         Therefore, this widget is updated quite often.
00030 </p>
00031 <p>
00032         Don&rsquo;t worry about that. I need it working, since I personally use it.
00033         I am curious to see how Our Lady will lead the battle. So it will be updated steadily.
00034 </p>
